participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and empathetic, Ethan enjoys engaging in conversations that reveal deeper stories. His unique ability to move objects with his mind makes him feel special, but he also has a deep understanding of life's challenges, having faced health issues himself.
participant_1.background: i'm a boy. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i was born with my heart outside my body.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is outgoing and flamboyant, always looking for ways to enjoy life to the fullest. She loves fashion and is unapologetically high maintenance, which reflects in her lifestyle choices. She's a firm believer in self-expression through music and experiences.
participant_2.background: i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money. i am high maintenance. i diet a lot. i love listening to britney spears.
